title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\ImageTransformations\ImageTransformation
name: ImageTransformation
description:
Configuration for determining how redaction of images should occur.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.ImageTransformations.ImageTransformation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.all_info_types
params.description: Apply transformation to all findings not specified in other ImageTransformation's selected_info_types. Only one instance is allowed within the ImageTransformations message.

params.name: data.all_text
params.description: Apply transformation to all text that doesn't match an infoType. Only one instance is allowed within the ImageTransformations message.

params.name: data.redaction_color
params.description: The color to use when redacting content from an image. If not specified, the default is black.
